passage_text: IT Technician Salary. IT Technician average salary is $43,947, median salary is $42,515 with a salary range from $26,853 to $70,221. IT Technician salaries are collected from government agencies and companies. Each salary is associated with a real job position.

IT technician salary in California:$45,000. You will note that the IT technician salary by state is lower than the national average. This is because these figures are for introductory IT technicians without a great deal of training. Those that move up into more advanced positions can expect to see a larger salary.

Average It Technician Salaries. The average salary for it technician jobs is $39,000. Average it technician salaries can vary greatly due to company, location, industry, experience and benefits. This salary was calculated using the average salary for all jobs with the term it technician anywhere in the job listing.

IT Technician average salary is $43,947, median salary is $42,515 with a salary range from $26,853 to $70,221. IT Technician salaries are collected from government agencies and companies. Each salary is associated with a real job position.

Bureau of Labor Statistics information states that the median salary in 2010 for IT Technicians or in their classification, Computer Support Specialists, was about $46,260 a year which comes out to around $22.24 an hour.
